select sku.id as sku_id, sku.*, goods.id as goods_id, goods.* from basic_sku sku inner join basic_goods goods on sku.goods_id=goods.id where sku.id = #{id}

select sku.id as sku_id, sku.*, goods.id as goods_id, goods.* from basic_sku sku inner join basic_goods goods on sku.goods_id=goods.id inner join basic_category category on goods.category=category.id
and goods.goods_name like concat('%', #{bo.goodsName}, '%')
and goods.goods_no like concat('%', #{bo.goodsNo}, '%')
and goods.brand=#{bo.brand}
